title: WeaponStats
description: Accompanying bonus stats to a weapon instance

charisma.description: A number value that modifies how charming or attractive the wielder is

constitution.description: A number value that modifies how much stamina or endurance the wielder has

defense.description: A number value that modifies the wielder's protection

dexterity.description: A number value that modifies how nimble the wielder is

intelligence.desription: A number value that modifies how book smart the wielder is

luck.desription: A number value that modifies how lucky the wielder is

perception.desription: A number value that modifies how aware of surroundings the wielder is

strength.desription: A number value that modifies how physically powerful the wielder is

wisdom.desription: A number value that modifies how street smart the wielder is

armor.desription: A number value that modifies how resilient the wielder is

created.description: The The ISO 8601 formatted date that this armor instances was created

updated.description: The The ISO 8601 formatted date that this armor instances was last updated
